summary: The module defines a hierarchy of HTTP response classes used by the Django web framework. It provides a base response container and specialized subclasses for plain text, JSON, redirects, streaming content, and efficient file delivery, handling status codes, headers, cookies, content encoding, and MIME types.
business_intent: To give Django developers a flexible, standardsâ€‘compliant way to construct and return HTTP responses of various types from their views, simplifying response creation, content handling, and client communication.
